column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We arrived around 6:30pm on a weekday
column2: and already there was a massive line. We put our name down along with our order
column3: and were told to come back after we got a message saying we would be seated soon. We walked around
column5: and then got seated upstairs. We were so hyped for the pizza - we couldn't contain our excitement. We had both had deep dish pizza before in another restaurant in Chicago as well as also other places
column6: but none of those had left any impression on us. When the pizza finally arrived
column7: our server cut the pizza into 6 slices
column8: and served us each a piece.
